Uses of Interface
Components.IPAMOJAComponent

  • Packages that use IPAMOJAComponent 
    Package Description
    Components
    Classes and hierarchies of packages used to implement grammar-aware engineering (GAE) components at the lexical, concrete and abstract syntax levels.
    Components.Abstract.Abstraction
    Provides classes and an interface implementing Abstractor component.
    Components.Abstract.AST
    Provides classes and an interface implementing AST component.
    Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree
    Provides classes and an interface implementing AST2BoxTree component.
    Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream
    Classes and an interface implementing BoxTree2Stream component.
    Components.Abstract.PanelTree
    Classes and an interface implementing a PanelTreeView component.
    Components.Abstract.Patterns
    Provides the implementation of Patterns component.
    Components.Abstract.Signature
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Signature component.
    Components.Abstract.TreeEditor
    This package provides classes and an interface for implementing a TreeEditor component.
    Components.BasicHybridEditor
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a BasicHybridEditor composite component.
    Components.Concrete.Flattener
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a Flattener component.
    Components.Concrete.Grammar
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Grammar component.
    Components.Concrete.Parser
    Contains classes, interfaces and hierarchies of packages used to implement Parser components (interpreting, source-code generated and table-driven).
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser
    A base class and two packages used to implement Deterministic and Limited backtracker Parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic  
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.LimitedBackTracker  
    Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser
    Provides a base class for source-code generated parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a source-code generated DeterministicParser component and its source-code view.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser
    Provides a base class for all LR parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser
    Provides classes and interface for implementing SLRParser component.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTables
    Provides a class and an interface for implementing ParseTable components.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing SLRParseTable component.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTree
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a ParseTree component.
    Components.Concrete.TreeBuilder
    Provides classes and interfaces for implementing TreeBuilder component for parse trees.
    Components.CoreHybridEditor
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a CoreHybridEditor component.
    Components.Formatter
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a Formatter (AST2Text) component.
    Components.Lexical.RichTextView
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a RichTextView component.
    Components.Lexical.Scanners
    Provides classes and package for creating Scanner components.
    Components.Lexical.Scanners.TableDriven
    Provides classes necessary for implementing a DFAScanner component.
    Components.Lexical.ScanTables
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a ScanTable component.
    Components.Lexical.Stream2Text
    Provides classes for implementing a StreamtoText component.
    Components.Lexical.SymbolStream
    Provides classes and interface for implementing a SymbolStream component.
    Components.Lexical.SymbolStyleCustomizer
    Classes implementing a SymbolStyleCustomizer component.
    Components.Lexical.SyntaxHighlighter
    Construction of a SyntaxHighlighter composite component.
    Components.Specifications.Language
    Classes composing a Language composite component.
    Components.Specifications.Presentation
    Classes composing a Presentation composite component.
    Components.Text2AST
    Provides classes composing a Text2AST composite component.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  INodeObject
      Interface which defines a method for returning a Node object.
      Classes in Components that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CNodeObject
      CNodeObject is an abstract class defining a method for returning a CNode object.
      class  CPAMOJAComponent
      A PAMOJAComponent is an object which can be displayed on the screen and which a user can customize and interact with.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Abstraction

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Abstraction 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IAbstractionComp
      Provides services for interacting with other components ( like, AST, ParseTree and Parser components) and the node factory.
      Classes in Components.Abstract.Abstraction that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CAbstractionComp
      Abstraction component holds a mapping from parse tree to AST.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IASTComp
      Provides methods for interacting connecting with other components.
      Classes in Components.Abstract.AST that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CASTComp
      This class creates an AST component which holds the structural representation of an AST.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IAST2BoxTreeComp
      Provides services for mapping an AST to a Box tree and for interacting with other components.
      Classes in Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CAST2BoxTreeComp
      A component which holds a mapping from AST to Box tree according to some pattern definitions.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IBoxTree2StreamComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, AST2BoxTree and Stream2Text components).
      Classes in Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CBoxTree2StreamComp
      BoxTree2Stream component with a mapping from box tree to symbolstream.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.PanelTree

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.PanelTree 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IPanelTreeComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Language, Presentation and CoreHybridEditor components).
      Classes in Components.Abstract.PanelTree that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPanelTreeComp
      A special kind of tree editor which displays an AST of a program as a hierarchy of nested panels and allows graphical editing of the AST.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Patterns

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Patterns 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IPatternsComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, AST2BoxTree component).
      Classes in Components.Abstract.Patterns that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPatternsComp
      Holds box layout specifications concerned with producing nicely formatted text.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Signature

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Signature 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ISignatureComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, TreeEditor component).
      Classes in Components.Abstract.Signature that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSignatureComp
      Holds the signature (abstract syntax) and maintains its consistency.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.TreeEditor

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.TreeEditor 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ITreeEditorComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components and classes ( like, Language component and NodeFactory class).
      Classes in Components.Abstract.TreeEditor that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CTreeEditorComp
      A non-visual component with basic operations for editing the different kinds of nodes of ASTs.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.BasicHybridEditor

      Classes in Components.BasicHybridEditor that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CBasicHybridEditorComp
      A composite component with facilities for constructing well-formed program texts and their corresponding abstract syntax tree representations by using both text and structure modes of operation.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Flattener

      class  CFlattenerComp
      A Flattener component holds a mapping from parse tree to symbolstream.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Grammar

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IGrammarComp
      Defines services for interacting with all grammar-dependent components of the framework.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CGrammarComp
      A component which holds lexical and context-free grammar definitions, and relations between them.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IParserComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Grammar and SymbolStream components).
      interface  IParserCompExt
      An extension of IParserComp interface with tree building and lookahead services.
      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for both interpreting parser and table-driven parser components.
      class  CParserCompExt
      This class extends abstract base class CParserComp with tree building services.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CInterpretingParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for interpreting parser components.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ISLRParseTableComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Grammar component).
      Classes in Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSLRParseTableComp
      An implementation of a component which holds SLR(1)-based parse tables and maintains consistency between the textual representation of SLR(1) tables and their corresponding structural representation.

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTree

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTree 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IParseTreeComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Parser component).
      Classes in Components.Concrete.ParseTree that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CParseTreeComp
      This component holds a parse tree generated by any of the parser components linked to it, and maintains consistency between the textual and structural representation of the parse tree.

      class  CScanTableComp

      class  CPresentationComp

    • Uses of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Text2AST

      Subinterfaces of IPAMOJAComponent in Components.Text2AST 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IText2ASTComp
      Interface provides services for interacting with other components such as Language and Typecheckers.
      Classes in Components.Text2AST that implement IPAMOJAComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CText2ASTComp
      A composite component which scans and parses program text to ensure that its lexically and syntactically well-formed and if successful its mapped to an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST), other wise it generates appropriate error messages.
